title: Gold Holds After Five-Day Rally as Investors Look to Jobs Data
description: Gold steadied after five days of gains, with investors focused on a raft of US data this week that should offer clues to the Federal Reserve’s appetite for further interest-rate cuts.
content: Gold steadied after five days of gains, with investors focused on a raft of US data this week that should offer clues to the Federal Reserve’s appetite for further interest-rate cuts.
